item.title: About
item.description:
I look after software development for a hardware startup. I frequently code in Python and Go, and sometimes in R and Javascript.

I’ve often found other developers blogs to be useful resources, so I set up my own to share some tips and tricks, and solutions to problems that didn’t have obvious solutions.
